TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TemplateInstance extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定模板的实例可创建的次数。

span.span: Specifies how many times an instance of a template can be created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举指定值，用于指示可以创建模板的实例的次数。The enumeration specifies values indicating the number of times an instance of a template can be created. Ttribute 类使用中的值枚举。The ttribute class uses values from the enumeration. 具体而言，ttribute。Single 和 ttribute。多个字段分别指定模板的单个和多个实例。In particular, the ttribute.Single and ttribute.Multiple fields specify single and multiple instances of a template, respectively. 模板的单个实例，可引用模板中包含的控件。A single instance of a template allows you to reference controls that are contained within the template. 使用中的属性元数据的单个值的控件的示例包括属性控件，属性控件，与属性。Examples of controls that use the Single value in property metadata include the property of the control, the property of the control, and the property of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用枚举和 ttribute 类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration and the ttribute class. 自定义控件，名为`MyLoginView`，重写属性并使用 ttribute 类来指定只有一个实例创建属性。A custom control, named `MyLoginView`, overrides the property and uses the ttribute class to specify that only one instance of the property is created. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance/cs/templateinstance.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance/vb/templateinstance.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是使用一个 ASPX 文件`MyLoginView`控件并演示如何访问内控件属性。The following code example is an ASPX file that uses the `MyLoginView` control and demonstrates how to access a control that is inside the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance/cs/templateinstance.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance/vb/templateinstance.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance Multiple = int32(0)

span.span: A template that is instantiated multiple times.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance Single = int32(1)

summary.span: 只可实例化一次的模板。

span.span: A template that is instantiated only one time.
